title: The Prophecy[DVDRIP]-Johonievision.AVI
description:
The Prophecy (1995)


When some angry angels, including Gabriel, become jealous of God&#039;s love and affection for humans, they decide to band together and declare war on mankind. But first they must defeat the good angels, who vehemently oppose the plan. To accomplish this, the evil ones choose as their leader a war... [More]
When some angry angels, including Gabriel, become jealous of God&#039;s love and affection for humans, they decide to band together and declare war on mankind. But first they must defeat the good angels, who vehemently oppose the plan. To accomplish this, the evil ones choose as their leader a war veteran who has just died. But to thwart their belligerent counterparts, the peace-loving cherubs grab the soldier&#039;s soul, and conceal it in the body of a young girl. Will this tactic successfully derail the "bad" angels&#039; anarchic agenda -- and save humanity in the process? [Less]
Genre: Horror/Suspense

Starring: Christopher Walken, Elias Koteas, Virginia Madsen, Eric Stoltz, Viggo Mortensen
Director: Gregory Widen
Screenwriter: Gregory Widen
Producer: Joel Soisson, W.K. Border, Michael Leary
